data.eml:eml: New species of deep­sea demosponges (Porifera) from the Aleutian Islands (Alaska, USA)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lehnert, Helmut, Stone, Robert, Heimler, Wolfgang (2006): New species of deep­sea demosponges (Porifera) from the Aleutian Islands (Alaska, USA). Zootaxa 1250: 1-35, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.173010
